verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mtakatifu Bwana Mungu wetu- ee hosana juu X3
(Mbinguni)X2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
1. Utukuzwe Mungu wetu Ee!
Mungu muumba wetu Ee!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
mbingu na dunia zimejaa utukufu wako ee! ee! ee!
Ee hosana juu mbinguni

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
2. Utukuzwe Mungu wetu Ee!
Mungu mkombozi wetu Ee!

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
uliangamiza mauti ukaleta uzima mpya ee! ee! ee!
Ee hosana juu mbinguni

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
3.Utukuzwe Mungu wetu Ee!
Mungu mfaliji wetu Ee!

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
ulimtuma Roho kwetu tuwe sote mwili mmoja
ee! ee! mbinguni
Ee hosana juu mbinguni
